name: Roxy
description: Roxy is the Eldorado's award-winning fine dining bistro, voted Best Place to Take a Date by locals and listed on the DiRoNa Award list of Distinguished Restaurants of North America. Chefs hand-select top cuts of meats, poultry and fish to create exquisite entrées prepared in a specialty wood-fired oven. Neighboring the Eldorado's Fountain of Fortune, Roxy showcases seven different architectural styles creating an enchanting European ambiance. Roxy's Bar & Lounge is famous for its 102 martinis and selection of 350 wines.
shortDescription: Award-winning fine dining bistro with wood-fired entrées and 102 martinis at the Eldorado.
hours: Sun & Mon - Closed | Tue - Thu 5pm - 9pm | Fri & Sat 5pm - 10pm

faqs.question: Is there a dress code at Roxy?
faqs.answer: Yes, appropriate dress is required. No sleeveless shirts for gentlemen.

faqs.question: Does Roxy have a bar?
faqs.answer: Yes, Roxy's Bar & Lounge features 102 martini varieties and 350 wines, with live piano and vocals nightly.

faqs.question: What awards has Roxy won?
faqs.answer: Roxy has earned the DiRoNa Award and Wine Spectator Award of Excellence, plus multiple Best of Reno honors.

meta.title: Roxy – Award-Winning Fine Dining at Eldorado Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Dine at Roxy, the Eldorado's DiRoNA-awarded bistro featuring wood-fired entrées, 102 martinis, and live piano nightly in downtown Reno.

testimonials.quote: Roxy was the perfect post-golf dinner spot. The menu had something for everyone in our group. eldorado-resorts-reno-eldorado-at-the-row is lucky to have this on-site.
testimonials.author: Matt H.

testimonials.quote: Had dinner at Roxy after our round and it was fantastic. Great food, attentive service, and they handled our group of 16 without a hitch. GTHS recommended it and they were spot on.
testimonials.author: Pete E.
